content: SEO Drink Buying Guide - Caffeine and Alcohol SEO Events V By: venice June 4, 2008 This YouMoz entry was submitted by one of our community members. The author’s views are entirely their own (excluding an unlikely case of hypnosis) and may not reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! V By: venice June 4, 2008 SEO Drink Buying Guide - Caffeine and Alcohol SEO Events This YouMoz entry was submitted by one of our community members. The author’s views are entirely their own (excluding an unlikely case of hypnosis) and may not reflect the views of Moz. After attending only a few SEO events and conferences, it becomes apparent that search marketers like two things just about as much as they like links. Those two things are caffeine and alcohol, something you'll typically find in great abundance at your next search marketing event. Growing up in the food and beverage industry, it's been second nature for me to pay attention to what people prefer to drink. I began compiling a list a while back and decided recently to update that list using Twitter. The tweet was simple - what do you drink (from Starbucks)(from the hotel bar)? There's been a Starbucks in nearly every hotel or conference center I've been to, so I chose that for the caffeine category. Consider this list as an SEO beverage buying guide or a Search Marketer drink cheat sheet. Either way, you can use it to impress your colleagues and break the proverbial ice when reaching out to meet others in the industry. For those that reply to my tweets, I've included name, URL, twitter profile, and preferred caffeine and alcohol related beverages. Enjoy the list and may good times follow! Name: Stephanie Weingart URL: http://www.frozen2late.com/ Twitter: @frozen2late Starbucks: Soy Chai No Water Latte Bar: Chardonnay, White Wine Name: Todd Friesen URL: http://www.oilman.ca/ Twitter: @oilman Starbucks: triple shot venti vanilla latte Bar: G&T or good vodka w/ ice Name: Barbara Boser URL: http://www.seowife.com/ Twitter: @BarbaraBoser Starbucks: Iced Grande no water 2 pump SFV Americano Bar: Dirty Goose with 3 olives Name: Susan Esparza URL: http://bruceclay.com/ Twitter: @SusanEsparza Starbucks: Grande non-fat latte, two pumps of vanilla, one pump of raspberry Bar: Grey Goose and Cranberry Name: Jon Kelly URL: http://jonathankelly.com/ Twitter: @jonkelly Starbucks: Straight Black Coffee Bar: Stoli Tonic Name: Loren Baker URL: http://www.searchenginejournal.com/ Twitter: @lorenbaker Starbucks: Grande coffee Bar: Vodka Martini, strait, 4 blue cheese olives Name: Carolyn Shelby URL: http://www.cshel.com/ Twitter: @cshel Starbucks: Iced venti 2 sweetnlow americano Bar: Ketel and Tonic (or Captain and Diet) depends on the mood Name: Greg Boser URL: www.blueglass.com/ Twitter: @GregBoser Starbucks: 5 shot Venti Americano Bar: Chopin rocks with a twist Name: Michelle Robbins URL: http://sphinn.com Twitter: @MichelleRobbins Starbucks: triple grande capuccino Bar: Dry, Extra Dirty, Grey Goose Martini Name: Cameron Olthuis URL: http://factivemedia.com/ Twitter: @factive Starbucks: coffee cream/sugar Bar: Sierra Nevada or Sam Adams Name: David Wallace URL: http://www.searchrank.com/ Twitter: @DavidWallace Starbucks: Vanilla Bean Frap, add 2 shots Bar: Beer - something dark (Porter, Stout or IPA) Name: Carrie Hill URL: http://www.seomom.com/ Twitter: @CarrieHill Starbucks: Skinny Vanilla Latte Bar: White Wine - Crisp & Sweet Name: Rachael Levenson URL: http://www.seerinteractive.com/ Twitter: @Rachael823 Starbucks: Skim Venti Mocha with Whip Bar: ? Name: Chris Winfield URL: www.blueglass.com/ Twitter: @chriswinfield Starbucks: Venti Soy Latte Bar: Heineken Sometimes SEOS mix their caffiene and alcohol Name: Todd Mintz URL: http://www.toddmintz.com/ Twitter: @toddmintz Starbucks: Black Coffee Bar: Dark Beer Name: Adrienne Doss URL: http://www.seowoman.com Twitter: @seowoman Starbucks: Grande Chai Latte plus 2 shots Bar: Guinness and Baileys Name: Ben Rabicoff URL: http://www.benrabicoff.com/ Twitter: @benrabicoff Starbucks: Tazo Passion Tea Bar: Grey Goose L'Orange on the rocks with an orange slice Name: Adam Audette URL: http://www.audettemedia.com/ Twitter: @audette Starbucks: Double Espresso Bar: Beer! especially IPAs, but also like Gin and Tonic Name: Dan Perry URL: http://danperry.com/wordpress/ Twitter: @danperry Starbucks: Not cool enough to have fav SB drink Bar: Bombay Sapphire martini, straight up with 2 bluecheese olives Name: Dave Snyder URL: http://snydeysense.com/ Twitter: @davesnyder Starbucks: Venti White Mocha with an extra shot Bar: Goose and Cranberry Name: Jim Gianoglio URL: http://www.lunametrics.com/ Twitter: @jgianoglio Starbucks: Cafe Mocha Bar: ? Name: Laura Callow URL: http://semcanada.org/ Twitter: @lauracallow Starbucks: French Vanilla Cappuccino Bar: Cabernet Sauvignon or Rum & Coke That's the list. Now go out and have some fun! Copied! Back to Top
